title: Permafrost
description: Two friends grew up together in Scotland. Now one is missing in Northern Michigan and the other, a successful businessman, has time on his hands. The hunt for the lost man begins as a mystery and evolves into an act of redemption.About the Author:Peter Robertson was born and raised in Edinburgh, Scotland, and has degrees from universities in England and the U.S. He lives in the Chicago area.
author: Peter   Robertson
